casebody.data:
Monday, April 12, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

98-1156. Bagnoli v. Northbrook Prop. & Cas. Ins. Co.

Stark App. No. 97CA00415. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Stark County.

*1451IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that this case be held for the decision in Supreme Court case No. 98-442, Scott-Pontzer v. Liberty Mutual Fire Insurance Co. et al.

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that oral argument currently scheduled for April 13,1999, be canceled.
